name: Keychron K2 QMK (V3)
title: Keychron K2 QMK (V3)
shortDescription: 75% wireless mechanical keyboard with QMK and hot-swap switches.
fullDescription: The K2 V3 is a compact 75% board with QMK/VIA programmability, Bluetooth multi-device pairing, hot-swappable MX-style sockets, and Mac/Windows keycaps.

name: Logitech MX Mechanical (Full Size)
title: Logitech MX Mechanical (Full Size)
shortDescription: Low-profile mechanical keyboard for coders and creators.
fullDescription: Offers Tactile Quiet/Linear/Clicky low-profile switches, smart backlighting, multi-OS legends, Easy-Switch pairing for three devices via Bluetooth LE or Logi Bolt.

name: Keychron K8 Pro
title: Keychron K8 Pro
shortDescription: Compact TKL with QMK/VIA and hot-swappable switches.
fullDescription: The K8 Pro brings factory-lubed stabilizers, south-facing RGB, gasket mounting, PBT keycaps, and wired/Bluetooth modes to a tenkeyless form factor.

name: Keychron Q1 Pro
title: Keychron Q1 Pro
shortDescription: 75% aluminum gasket-mount custom board with QMK/VIA.
fullDescription: Wireless/wired with tri-mode connectivity, CNC aluminum case, double-gasket design, south-facing RGB, and hot-swap sockets for easy switch changes.

name: Corsair K70 RGB Pro
title: Corsair K70 RGB Pro
shortDescription: Full-size RGB mechanical gaming keyboard.
fullDescription: Tournament-ready with CHERRY MX switches, per-key RGB backlighting, dedicated media controls, and durable aluminum frame. Out of Stock - Popular Item!

name: Raspberry Pi 5 (4GB)
title: Raspberry Pi 5 (4GB)
shortDescription: Quad-core Arm Cortex-A76 SBC with dual 4K HDMI.
fullDescription: 2.4GHz Cortex-A76 CPU, VideoCore VII GPU, PCIe 2.0 x1 via HAT+, dual MIPI, 2× USB 3.0, GbE, and improved I/O via the RP1 southbridge.

name: NVIDIA Jetson Nano Developer Kit (4GB)
title: NVIDIA Jetson Nano Developer Kit (4GB)
shortDescription: Entry-level AI computer for edge ML projects.
fullDescription: GPU-accelerated compute suitable for computer vision and robotics. Includes USB 3.0, GbE, HDMI/DP, CSI camera connectors, and 40-pin GPIO.

name: Adafruit Feather RP2040
title: Adafruit Feather RP2040
shortDescription: Feather-format microcontroller with Raspberry Pi RP2040.
fullDescription: Dual-core M0+ ~125MHz, 8MB QSPI flash, USB-C, LiPo charging, STEMMA QT, and plentiful GPIO—great for embedded prototyping and teaching.

name: Adafruit Metro M4 Express (SAMD51)
title: Adafruit Metro M4 Express (SAMD51)
shortDescription: Arduino-compatible board with 120MHz Cortex-M4F.
fullDescription: Fast SAMD51 MCU with floating point, USB native support, CircuitPython/Arduino compatibility, and lots of GPIO for serious prototyping.

name: Arduino Mega 2560 Rev3
title: Arduino Mega 2560 Rev3
shortDescription: Classic Arduino with 54 digital I/O pins.
fullDescription: ATmega2560 microcontroller with 256KB flash, perfect for complex projects requiring many I/O pins. Currently Out of Stock.

name: IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate
title: IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate
shortDescription: Full-featured IDE for JVM and polyglot development.
fullDescription: Advanced code analysis, refactorings, debuggers, test runners, and ecosystem plugins for Java, Kotlin, and more.

name: Postman (Team Plan)
title: Postman (Team Plan)
shortDescription: API design, testing, and collaboration platform.
fullDescription: Collections, environments, monitors, mock servers, and team workspaces to accelerate API development and QA.

name: Docker Desktop (Pro)
title: Docker Desktop (Pro)
shortDescription: Local containers and Kubernetes for Windows/macOS.
fullDescription: Build, share, and run containers with Compose, Dev Environments, and optional Kubernetes—streamlined developer UX.

name: TablePlus (Perpetual License)
title: TablePlus (Perpetual License)
shortDescription: Modern native database GUI.
fullDescription: Manage Postgres, MySQL, SQLite, SQL Server, and more with fast inline editing, safe change review, and powerful filters.

name: The Pragmatic Programmer (20th Anniversary Edition)
title: The Pragmatic Programmer (20th Anniversary Edition)
shortDescription: Modern classic on the craft of software.
fullDescription: Practical advice on coding, debugging, automation, and career-long habits—updated for today's tools and practices.

name: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
shortDescription: A deep dive into scalable, reliable data systems.
fullDescription: Explains data models, storage, stream processing, replication, and consistency with real-world trade-offs.

name: Introduction to Algorithms (CLRS, 4e)
title: Introduction to Algorithms (CLRS, 4e)
shortDescription: Comprehensive algorithms textbook.
fullDescription: Covers fundamental algorithms and data structures with proofs, analysis, and pseudocode used worldwide in academia and industry. Currently Out of Stock - Awaiting Reprint.

name: You Don't Know JS Yet (2nd Ed.)
title: You Don't Know JS Yet (2nd Ed.)
shortDescription: JavaScript deeply explained.
fullDescription: Explores JS mechanics like scope, closures, types, and async patterns to help you write clearer, more reliable code.

name: Clean Code by Robert C. Martin
title: Clean Code by Robert C. Martin
shortDescription: A handbook of agile software craftsmanship.
fullDescription: Learn how to write clean, maintainable code that's easy to understand and modify. Essential reading for every developer.

name: Herman Miller Aeron (Size B)
title: Herman Miller Aeron (Size B)
shortDescription: Iconic ergonomic mesh office chair.
fullDescription: Adjustable lumbar support, breathable mesh, and durable build designed for long, comfortable coding sessions.

name: IKEA Markus
title: IKEA Markus
shortDescription: High-back chair with headrest.
fullDescription: Supportive mesh back, tilt/lock, and height adjustment—popular budget-friendly option for home offices.

name: Steelcase Leap V2
title: Steelcase Leap V2
shortDescription: Award-winning ergonomic office chair.
fullDescription: LiveBack technology flexes to support your spine, with adjustable everything for all-day comfort. Currently Out of Stock.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S
title: Logitech MX Master 3S
shortDescription: Ergonomic wireless mouse with silent clicks.
fullDescription: MagSpeed electromagnetic scroll, 8K DPI, Flow multi-computer control, and USB-C quick charging.

name: Elgato Stream Deck MK.2
title: Elgato Stream Deck MK.2
shortDescription: 15-key customizable macro pad.
fullDescription: Programmable LCD keys trigger apps, shortcuts, and multi-actions—great for automations, builds, and streaming controls.

name: Blue Yeti USB Microphone
title: Blue Yeti USB Microphone
shortDescription: Professional USB microphone for streaming and recording.
fullDescription: Four pickup patterns, studio-quality sound, and plug-and-play setup. Perfect for podcasting, streaming, and voice-overs. Out of Stock - High Demand.

name: LG UltraWide 34" Monitor
title: LG UltraWide 34" Monitor
shortDescription: 34-inch curved ultrawide monitor with QHD resolution.
fullDescription: 3440x1440 IPS display with HDR10, USB-C connectivity, and built-in speakers for immersive productivity.

name: Anker USB-C Hub (7-in-1)
title: Anker USB-C Hub (7-in-1)
shortDescription: Compact 7-port USB-C hub with 4K HDMI.
fullDescription: Includes HDMI, USB 3.0 ports, SD/microSD readers, and 100W Power Delivery passthrough for laptops.
